snippet: Colorado attorneys can advise marijuana businesses on how to navigate the industry's legal complexities without fear of punishment, the state's Supreme Court said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Court Says Lawyers Can Advise Pot Clients
headline.main: Colorado Court Says Lawyers Can Advise Pot Clients

lead_paragraph: Colorado attorneys can advise marijuana businesses on how to navigate the industry's legal complexities without fear of punishment, the state's Supreme Court said Monday.
